name: Virgin Indian Bundles
description:
Pictured - 20" Virgin Indian Natural Straight Bundles for $100 per bundle

Please select the LENGTH and TEXTURE you wish to order from the drop box below.

FEATURES

100% Unprocessed Virgin Indian Hair

Grade AAAAAA

Can be colored, cut, flat ironed and curled.

Last from 6 months to a 1 year depending on care.

No shedding or matting

No synthetic mix

1 bundle 3.5oz to 3.7oz 

12” to 16” needs 2 bundles for a full sew in. 18” to 30” needs 3 to 4         bundles for a full sew in. Remember the longer the length the shorter the weft

Hair colors are dependent on donors and only come dark brown to light brown.
